summary:
PLEARN - An application established to make earning a fun part of your lifestyle

 PLEARN [PLN] - Plearn is a DeFi (Decentralized Finance) product built on a blockchain ecosystem where every process is controlled by smart contract that can be audited with fast transaction and low fee

 PLEARN - is the best Choice for Holders

 PLEARN - Our Business Partners will increase the opportunity to expand your products or services to new customers and to fully utilize your resources and assets

 PLEARN - Users Instantly receive beginner privileges by just signing up to PLEARN

 HOW TO EARN PLN? - PLEARN’s token, “PLN”, is the platform token distributed to investors, partners, and users who stake specified crypto currencies in our DeFi farm or swap other crypto currencies into PLN

 Ranking & Privileges - Special privileges for PLN holders, the more token you stake, the more benefits you will earn

 Timeline - SWAP BUSD, BNB, SIX to PLN
